GSD.description:
spi: fsi: Implement a timeout for polling status

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit d4982ceb137e6ecd2b466a6de639790a148cf19a. For more details please see the references link.
